Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka scored 56* (22) and took 2 wickets for 4 runs
Axar Patel scored 65 runs off 31 balls with 3 fours and 6 sixes
Sri Lanka won by 16 runs with a score of 206/6 and India scored 190/8
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune
Rahul Tripathi made his T20I debut for India
